content.new:
when I try to run this command

```
ign gazebo shapes.sdf -v 4
```

I got a blank window and this message keeps repeating

```
[GUI] [Dbg] [ign.cc:359] GUI requesting list of world names. The server may be busy downloading resources. Please be patient.
```

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/4pGM797/images/1870464282-Screenshot%20from%202020-03-30%2011-40-58.png)
ignition: acropolis

OpenGL version string: 4.6.0 NVIDIA 390.116

ubuntu 18.04

I attached my log file
